name: CQ_Analytics.MobileSliderUtils
doc:
A helper class providing a set of utility methods for the mobile slider.
This class is a singleto...

props.name: MobileSliderUtils.CONFIG
props.doc:
<static> Mobile slider config per application. Sample config:
window.CQMobileSlider["geomet...

methods.name: getConfig
methods.doc: Returns a mobile slider config property. See CONFIG.

methods.name: injectCss
methods.doc: Injects a CSS into the DOM.

methods.name: injectDesktopBodyClass
methods.doc: Injects desktop classes on the body and removes mobile classes from the body.

methods.name: injectDesktopCss
methods.doc: Injects desktop CSS and removes mobile CSS.

methods.name: injectMobileBodyClass
methods.doc: Injects mobile classes on the body and removes desktop classes from the body.

methods.name: injectMobileCss
methods.doc: Injects mobile CSS and removes mobile CSS.

methods.name: removeCss
methods.doc: Removes a CSS from the DOM.

methods.name: switchToDesktop
methods.doc: Switches the UI to the desktop version: injects desktop CSS/classes and removes mobile CSS/classes.

methods.name: switchToMobile
methods.doc: Switches the UI to the mobile version: injects mobile CSS/classes and removes desktop CSS/classes.
